addons.name: gui:config
addons.description: This extension provides advanced configuration for your browser. It allows you to easily change many additional options, which are not displayed in the Firefox Options dialog.
addons.fullDescription:
gui:config makes it easier to change preferences that can only be found in the “about:config”.

    Search bar: enter search terms to quickly find the options you are looking for.
    Easy reset: reset options via the context menu.
    Copy preference name: copy the name of a preference to the clipboard via the context menu. 


Thanks to the people at babelzilla.org for the translations.

screenshots.caption: Alternatively you can open the preferences in a window.
Add the gui:config button to your toolbar or main menu for easy access.

addons.name: MinUI
addons.description: Hide various elements of the user interface with Ctrl+F11. Tap it again to unhide. No restart required.
addons.fullDescription: Configure what you want to hide in Tools > MinUI. [Currently, scroll bar hiding has some bugs.]
addons.developerComments:
A bug (fixed in Firefox 13) caused flash video to restart when the scrollbar was hidden.

If you'd like to contribute, you can do so at one of my other add-ons, just be sure to mention"for MinUI": Contribute

addons.name: Hide Tabbar
addons.description: Hide the tabbar by just pressing a key.
addons.fullDescription:
Don't want others to see your tabs? Or just want more space for the websites?
No problem, with this add-on you can hide the tabbar, by just pressing a key.
Pressing the key again, makes everything as it was before.

You can choose a hotkey to do that job or set a time to auto hide the tabbar. It is possible to override existing hotkeys like F1 if you want.

This extension also brings back the feature of hiding the tabbar when only one tab is open, which was removed in Firefox 23.

Please help us translating this add-on into your native language:
http://board.onbroga.de/viewtopic.php?f=62&t=996

addons.name: IP Address and Domain Information
addons.description: The Ultimate online investigation tool! See detailed information about every IP Address, Domain Name and Provider.
addons.fullDescription:
*** PLEASE READ THIS ***

If You use the NoScript Add-on or other JavaScript blocking add-on, please add www.tcpiputils.com to the Whitelist. If you don't see the icon you can use the hotkey CTRL-SHIFT-I to show the popup.

*** END ***

This extension displays detailed information about the current website. The information can be used for online investigation and SEO purposes.

See IP info like (IPv4 and IPv6): location, DNS, whois data, routing, domain neighbors, blacklists and ASN information. Including a shortcut to Your public IP Address (myIP info).

See domain info like: Alexa en Quantcast ranking, DMOZ info, social media activity, WOT ranking, whois data and PageRank of every domain.

See provider info like: BGP, IPv4 subnets, IPv6 subnets, connected providers (peers), hosted nameservers, hosted domains, number of spam hosts, bogon subnets and whois data.

screenshots.caption: start screen of add-on with IPv4 information.
